meanings.sent1: She wore the swankest dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The swankest shoes were on display at the boutique.
meanings.sent3: Everyone admired her swankest outfit and asked where she got it.
meanings.sent4: The swankest car in town turned heads wherever it went.
meanings.sent5: His swankest hat completed his look and made him stand out.

meanings.sent1: The hotel suite was the swankest room I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: She received the swankest gift for her birthday.
meanings.sent3: The swankest restaurant in town had a menu fit for royalty.
meanings.sent4: The swankest yacht in the harbor gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The swankest jewelry sparkled under the lights of the ballroom.
